author: Tan Lee Meng J:
casename: Lai Swee Lin Linda v Attorney-General
counsel: The applicant in person; Leong Kwang Ian (Attorney-General's Chambers) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Insolvency Law/Bankruptcy/Stay of bankruptcy proceedings/Applicant being served with statutory demand to pay costs of previous action/Applicant pursuing new action with intention to recover costs ordered against her in previous action/Applicant alleging that Attorney-General using costs owed by her as weapon to prevent her from pursuing matter/Whether good reasons furnished to justify why appeal should be allowed/Section 64 Bankruptcy Act (Cap 20, 2000 Rev Ed)
